document_name: Audited financial statements FY 2024 (KPMG Singapore or equivalent)

Copies of all licences listed in Clause 4 (BCA Contractor Registration, HDB Registered Renovation Contractor, BCA Safety Personnel Registration, PUB Drainage Contractor Licence, LTA Utility Services Licence)
Copies of all certifications listed in Clause 5 (ISO 9001, ISO 14001, ISO 45001, bizSAFE Level Star)
Insurance certificates meeting the limits in Clause 6 (Work Injury Compensation, Public Liability, Contract Works)
Safety documentation as per Clause 8 (bizSAFE Level Star rating report, BCA Safety Personnel Registration copy, safety management plan)
Quality documentation as per Clause 9 (current ISO 9001 certification, quality assurance and control description)
Technical proposal, methodology and programme (max 30 pages)
Certified copies of all licences and registrations listed in Clause 2.2
Certified copies of all certifications listed in Clause 2.3
Insurance certificates meeting the minimum coverages in Clause 2.4
Audited financial statements for 2022, 2023 and 2024, signed by the auditor identified in Clause 2.1
Company profile and banking reference letters from DBS or UOB
Experience evidence as required in Clause 2.5 (project reports, client letters, photographs)
Safety and quality management documentation (bizSAFE Star certificate, BCA Safety Personnel registration, ISO certificates)
Company profile (including licences, certifications, insurance certificates)
Detailed project experience list with client references, contract values, and duration
Safety and quality management plans referencing bizSAFE Star and ISO 9001 standards
Audited financial statements for FY 2023 and FY 2024
Bank reference letters from DBS Bank Ltd or UOB Commercial Banking
Audited Financial Statements for FY 2022, FY 2023, and FY 2024
Copies of all licences listed in Section 2
Copies of all certifications listed in Section 3
Project Experience Summary (covering the required 3‑5 year period)
Bank reference letter from DBS or UOB
Bank Guarantee or Performance Bond (5% of Contract Value)
BCA Contractor Registration (CW01 – General Building) licence
ISO 45001: Occupational Health & Safety Management System certificate
Project references (including completion certificates and client testimonials)
Quality Management Plan (QMP) for the project
Proof of active corporate bank account (bank letter or recent bank statement)
Audited financial statements and auditor’s report (prepared by KPMG Singapore or equivalent)
Company Profile (including corporate structure, key personnel, and organisational chart)
Audited Financial Statements for FY 2022, FY 2023 and FY 2024 (signed by KPMG Singapore or equivalent)
Bank Guarantee / Standby Letter of Credit (issued by DBS or UOB)
Copies of all licences and registrations listed in 2.c)
Copies of ISO 9001, ISO 14001, ISO 45001 and bizSAFE Level Star certificates
Experience Matrix (project name, client, value, scope, completion date)
Safety Management Plan (aligned with bizSAFE and BCA safety registration)
Technical Proposal (methodology, programme, resources, BIM execution plan)
Commercial Proposal (detailed Bill of Quantities, unit rates, provisional sums)
